description: This file implements the Wi-Fi Hardware Abstraction Layer (HAL) for an embedded Linux-based device, providing functions for initializing, resetting, and configuring wireless access points, including management of hostapd processes, Wi-Fi security settings, and interface controls. It serves as a central source file with implementations for controlling Wi-Fi radios, SSIDs, security modes, and related system commands.

methods.name: INT list_add_param(param_list_t * list,struct params params)
methods.description: Adds a parameter to a list, with memory allocation handling.

methods.name: void list_free_param(param_list_t * list)
methods.description: Frees memory allocated for parameter list.

methods.name: INT prepare_hostapd_conf()
methods.description: Prepares hostapd configuration files by copying default configs into nvram.

methods.name: wlan_encryption_mode_to_string
methods.description: Converts encryption mode string to human-readable format.

methods.name: INT File_Reading(CHAR * file,char * Value)
methods.description: Executes a command and reads a single line output from the file or command.

methods.name: wlan_wireless_mode_to_supported_standards_string
methods.description: Maps wireless mode to supported standards string.

methods.name: wlan_bitrate_to_operated_standards_string
methods.description: Converts bitrate information into supported standards string.

methods.name: wlan_operated_standards_to_channel_bandwidth_string
methods.description: Maps wireless mode to channel bandwidth string.

methods.name: INT Hostapd_PublicWifi_status(char status[50])
methods.description: Checks if the public Wi-Fi (wlan0_0) interface is running.

methods.name: INT Hostapd_PrivateWifi_status(char status[50])
methods.description: Checks if the private Wi-Fi (wlan0) interface is running.

methods.name: INT GetInterfaceName(char interface_name[50],char conf_file[100])
methods.description: Extracts interface name from hostapd config.

methods.name: INT GetInterfaceName_virtualInterfaceName_2G(char interface_name[50])
methods.description: Extracts virtual interface name for 2G Wi-Fi from hostapd config.

methods.name: void Stop_Start_Broadcasting_SSID_Names_Hostapd_Process(bool * Public_ssid,char * Alias_Interface_name)
methods.description: Starts or stops SSID broadcasting on the hostapd interface.

methods.name: void GetInterfaceName_HostapdConf(int apIndex,char * interface_name)
methods.description: Gets interface name based on hostapd config index.

methods.name: void Dynamically_Disabling_hostapd_process(int apIndex)
methods.description: Disables a hostapd process by interface.

methods.name: void Dynamically_Enabling_hostapd_process(int apIndex)
methods.description: Enables a hostapd process by interface.

methods.name: void Dynamically_Updated_Password_hostapd_process(int apIndex,char * password)
methods.description: Updates WPA passphrase and restarts hostapd process.

methods.name: void Dynamically_Updated_SSIDAdvertisement_Hostapd_Process(int apIndex,bool enable)
methods.description: Enables or disables SSID broadcast dynamically.

methods.name: void Dynamically_Updated_SSIDName_Hostapd_Process(int apIndex,char * ssid)
methods.description: Updates the SSID name dynamically.

methods.name: void Dynamically_Updated_Security_Encryption_Modes_Hostapd_Process(int apIndex,char * mode,char * String)
methods.description: Updates security and encryption modes dynamically.

methods.name: void Dynamically_Updated_Channel_Value_hostapd_process(INT apIndex,ULONG Value)
methods.description: Changes Wi-Fi channel dynamically.

methods.name: void Dynamically_Enabling_And_Disabling_WPS_Support_Hostapd_Process(int apIndex,bool enable)
methods.description: Enables or disables WPS support dynamically.

methods.name: void Dynamically_Updated_WPS_ConfigMethods_Hostapd_process(int apIndex,char * MethodString)
methods.description: Updates WPS configuration methods.

methods.name: void Dynamically_Updated_WPS_ApPin_Hostapd_Process(int apIndex,ULONG pin)
methods.description: Updates WPS AP PIN dynamically.

methods.name: void RestartHostapd()
methods.description: Restarts hostapd interface and processes.

methods.name: void KillHostapd()
methods.description: Kills hostapd processes and resets interfaces.

methods.name: void defaultwifi_restarting_process()
methods.description: Restarts default Wi-Fi configuration for TP-Link devices.

methods.name: int hostapd_restarting_process(int apIndex)
methods.description: Restarts hostapd for a given access point index with specific configuration.

methods.name: void get_mac(unsigned char * mac)
methods.description: Retrieves MAC address of a specified interface.

methods.name: BOOL checkWifi()
methods.description: Checks if hostapd process is running.

methods.name: BOOL checkLanInterface()
methods.description: Checks if wireless interfaces are active.

methods.name: INT GettingHostapdSsid(INT ssidIndex,char * hostapd_conf,char * val)
methods.description: Retrieves the SSID name from hostapd config files.

methods.name: void DisableWifi(int InstanceNumber)
methods.description: Disables wireless interface(s) based on instance number.

methods.name: wifi_getBaseBSSID
methods.description: Retrieves MAC address of the BSSID for given interface and index.

methods.name: wifi_getBaseBSSID
methods.description: Retrieves the BSSID of an SSID.

methods.name: wifi_getSSIDMACAddress
methods.description: Retrieves MAC address associated with an SSID index.

methods.name: wifi_getSSIDTrafficStats2
methods.description: Retrieves static traffic statistics for an SSID.

methods.name: INT wifi_applySSIDSettings(INT ssidIndex)
methods.description: Applies SSID and AP settings to hardware.

methods.name: wifi_getNeighboringWiFiStatus
methods.description: Gets neighboring Wi-Fi access points' status for a given AP index.

methods.name: int GetScanningValues(char * file,char * value)
methods.description: Utility to extract scan results from a command output file.

methods.name: void updated_string_value(char * buf,char * buf1)
methods.description: Helper function to copy string value removing newline.

methods.name: wifi_getNeighboringWiFiDiagnosticResult2
methods.description: Performs Wi-Fi scan to find nearby APs, populates array with details including signal, security, standards, etc.

methods.name: wifi_getNeighbor_ap_array
methods.description: Returns results of neighboring Wi-Fi AP scan.

methods.name: INT wifi_getAllAssociatedDeviceDetail(INT apIndex,ULONG * output_ulong,wifi_device_t ** output_struct)
methods.description: Retrieves detailed information about all associated client devices.

methods.name: wifi_kickAssociatedDevice
methods.description: Kicks a specific associated client device.

methods.name: INT wifi_createAp(INT apIndex,INT radioIndex,CHAR * essid,BOOL hideSsid)
methods.description: Creates a new Wi-Fi AP with specified parameters.

methods.name: INT wifi_deleteAp(INT apIndex)
methods.description: Deletes an existing Wi-Fi AP.

methods.name: wifi_getApName
methods.description: Gets the name of an AP.

methods.name: wifi_getIndexFromName
methods.description: Obtain the index number from SSID string.

methods.name: wifi_getApBeaconType
methods.description: Retrieves the current beacon type in use on an AP.

methods.name: wifi_setApBeaconType
methods.description: Sets the beacon type for an AP.

methods.name: wifi_setApBeaconInterval
methods.description: Sets the beacon interval for an AP.

methods.name: wifi_setDTIMInterval
methods.description: Sets the DTIM interval for an AP.

methods.name: wifi_getApRtsThresholdSupported
methods.description: Checks whether RTS threshold setting is supported.

methods.name: wifi_setApRtsThreshold
methods.description: Configures RTS threshold value.

methods.name: wifi_getApWpaEncryptionMode
methods.description: Retrieves AP WPA encryption mode.

methods.name: wifi_setApWpaEncryptionMode
methods.description: Sets the WPA encryption mode for an AP.

methods.name: wifi_removeApSecVaribles
methods.description: Removes security variables for an AP from configs.

methods.name: INT wifi_disableApEncryption(INT apIndex)
methods.description: Disables encryption on an AP.

methods.name: wifi_setApAuthMode
methods.description: Configures authentication mode on an AP.

methods.name: wifi_setApBasicAuthenticationMode
methods.description: Configures basic authentication mode as none, EAP, or PSK.

methods.name: wifi_getApSecurityModesSupported
methods.description: Reports the list of security modes supported by the AP.

methods.name: wifi_getApSecurityModeEnabled
methods.description: Indicates which security mode is currently enabled.

methods.name: wifi_getApSecurityPreSharedKey
methods.description: Retrieves the pre-shared key in use for the AP.

methods.name: wifi_setApSecurityPreSharedKey
methods.description: Sets the pre-shared key for the AP.

methods.name: wifi_getApSecurityKeyPassphrase
methods.description: Outputs the WPA passphrase for the AP.

methods.name: wifi_setApSecurityKeyPassphrase
methods.description: Sets the WPA passphrase for the AP.

methods.name: wifi_setApSecurityReset
methods.description: Resets the security settings of the AP to factory defaults.

methods.name: wifi_getApSecurityRadiusServer
methods.description: Retrieves RADIUS server settings.

methods.name: wifi_setApSecurityRadiusServer
methods.description: Sets RADIUS server configuration.

methods.name: wifi_getApSecuritySecondaryRadiusServer
methods.description: Retrieves secondary RADIUS server configuration.

methods.name: wifi_setApSecuritySecondaryRadiusServer
methods.description: Sets secondary RADIUS server configuration.

methods.name: wifi_getApSecurityRadiusSettings
methods.description: Retrieves RADIUS settings such as retries and timeouts.

methods.name: wifi_setApSecurityRadiusSettings
methods.description: Configures RADIUS settings.

methods.name: wifi_getApWpsEnable
methods.description: Checks if WPS is enabled for the AP.

methods.name: wifi_setApWpsEnable
methods.description: Enables or disables WPS for the AP.

methods.name: wifi_getApWpsConfigMethodsSupported
methods.description: Lists supported WPS configuration methods.

methods.name: wifi_getApWpsConfigMethodsEnabled
methods.description: Lists enabled WPS configuration methods.

methods.name: wifi_setApWpsConfigMethodsEnabled
methods.description: Configures enabled WPS methods.

methods.name: wifi_getApWpsDevicePIN
methods.description: Retrieves the WPS device PIN.

methods.name: wifi_setApWpsDevicePIN
methods.description: Sets the WPS device PIN.

methods.name: wifi_getApWpsConfigurationState
methods.description: Indicates if WPS is configured.

methods.name: wifi_setApWpsEnrolleePin
methods.description: Sets the WPS enrollee pin.

methods.name: INT SetWPSButton(char * interface_name)
methods.description: Triggers WPS push button mode.

methods.name: wifi_setApWpsButtonPush
methods.description: Simulates pressing the WPS push button.

methods.name: INT wifi_cancelApWPS(INT apIndex)
methods.description: Cancels WPS for the AP.
